overview: Maybe you can't krump. (Maybe you don't even know what krumping is.) But did you know that krumping comes in a variety of styles, including "beastly," "scary," "rugged" and even "funny"? In this fast-paced instructional program, the creators of the South Central-based dance style show you how to adapt your moves to suit your mood. And you won't want to miss a dance showdown between Tight Eyez and the Victorville Clowns.
title: Styles of Krump
